name: cwmsjs
description: Corps Water Management System (CWMS) Data API (CDA) client library created with OpenAPI generator that wraps the CDA API in TypeScript for creating web applications with JavaScript, React, TypeScript, Node.js
author: USACE,HEC,CWMS,OpenApi Contributors

scripts.build: cd src && babel src -d dist && cd .. && npm run docs && npm run examples
scripts.openapi-test: shx rm -r ./src/src && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -o ./src -i cwms-swagger.test.json -c openapi.config.json
scripts.clean: shx mkdir -p ./src && shx rm -r ./src && shx mkdir -p ./src/docs && shx rm -r ./src/docs
